mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(c.custom_image_url, cp.card_image_url) AS cardImageUrl, cp.card_product_name AS cardProductName, b.bank_name AS bankName, m.name AS memberName FROM card c JOIN card_product cp ON c.card_product_id = cp.id JOIN bank b ON cp.bank_id = b.id JOIN member m ON c.member_id = m.id WHERE c.member_id = #{memberId} AND c.is_valid = 1
